name: Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Core Leather
tooltip:
Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Core LeatherLevel 60

Many of the sacred recipes require the skin from Ragnaros' chosen pets.

Offer 2 Core Leather, skinned from the smoldering corpses of the Core Hounds of the Molten Core and you shall be granted favor amongst the Brotherhood.

Requirements:
- Core Leather x 2
